name: Trick or Threat (Potatuetata)
description:
This game is a submission to the "Marlin´s Haunted Halloween Horror Jam". It is a short interactive story which is based on the Halloween theme and the bonus theme "Good and Evil". 
I used Game Maker Studio 2 to build this game and it took ~ 25 hours , because I had no clue what I was doing. 

Things I learned in this game jam: 
- How to use paths 
- How to make text bubbles
- How to make things interactable on a large scale


How to control:

-W,A,S,D: move around
- E: interact
- Left mouse button for the main menu :)

The Art is completly done by myself, but the sound effects are from freesounds.org
Credits:
